Resizable¶

Elements that can be resized using the mouse. This module uses the Resizable JavaScript plugin.

SASS¶

@mixin resizable($resize_class:"resizing",$click_spacing:10)

Makes the current element resizable

$resize_class

Class to be added to the element during the resizing process.

$click_spacing

Maximum spacing to the element’s border to initiate the resizing process.

@mixin bp-resizing($resize_class:"resizing") { @content }

Styles to be applied during the resizing process.

$resize_class

Class.

@content

Styles.
